name: Sector 5 invasion
description:
Sector 5 invasion is a mini game (like the old Invaders) to be featured in Sector 5.

We decided to release this mini game for free so people that support the project see that after being quiet for sometime we are still working in the Development of the game(more info on the site).

We hope you enjoy it even if it's a simple game and short, you can see we made some upgrades to the graphics from the old CR-Fighter.

The sound on the other hand, is currently used for prototyping so be kind!
